titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 100th anniversary of Rice University.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 6/27/2012--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the 100th anniversary of Rice University, located in Houston, Texas. Expresses gratitude to the University for its innumerable contributions to higher education and this country.
